name: part_001

scenes.description: Title card for 'On the Run! hololive English -Advent- 2nd Anniversary Live'.
Kureiji Ollie promotion for holoplus ZOM-RAID TIME.
Concert waiting screen for hololive English 3rd Concert 'ALL FOR ONE'.
Attention screen for visitors with safety and cheering instructions.
Display of in-stock and made-to-order concert merchandise.
Collage of fan messages supporting hololive English members.
Closing title card for 'On the Run!'.
